name: Rise Of R2
description:
R2-D2 has been captured by the Empire and is locked in one of their many ships… One day, he manages to escape. But now he's being chased by stormtroopers.

All this time he has been collecting dust and the further he goes, the more the dust disappears and the difficulty of the game grows.

But be careful, the faster R2-D2 goes, the more perilous the journey will be…

Move forward : Left arrow

Jump : Up arrow

Begin or Retry : Space bar
